Two users carelessly reused a prime when generating their RSA keys. Intercept the message encrypted with both public keys: 541726583274610824568173144322341743188960654640452188494134292631355958454707141680934211362154875668642081221328078121832138976093269229305121037305707815405523295075901636486179291940906315926984437946764136892091487663451304296

The flag format is flag{...}
n=671980681588048672125738877011616910595171309192390917632486145735608250077671710928467557898579995687263516173582338160567166630973018801630439450961428600165761183693047040907011406881127763762684275273947489612272855128289784303, n2=793885947016404535029160617097730367600543561934542300852330496973604618480948156173846538257488487134881450821739324696794727159785145564103816395506406360709994174038046765379978157857270959781000832073843348003783796050827222847, e=180544813110790873655789679789842973436092621908357943603962391991591775632311091904456541415508585982049014007970958669775536157988267825578433559044437656935705244373460500358598396450260377616551234505310174605689617135935102917

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{132em2hk}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 541726583274610824568173144322341743188960654640452188494134292631355958454707141680934211362154875668642081221328078121832138976093269229305121037305707815405523295075901636486179291940906315926984437946764136892091487663451304296
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=671980681588048672125738877011616910595171309192390917632486145735608250077671710928467557898579995687263516173582338160567166630973018801630439450961428600165761183693047040907011406881127763762684275273947489612272855128289784303, n2=793885947016404535029160617097730367600543561934542300852330496973604618480948156173846538257488487134881450821739324696794727159785145564103816395506406360709994174038046765379978157857270959781000832073843348003783796050827222847, e=180544813110790873655789679789842973436092621908357943603962391991591775632311091904456541415508585982049014007970958669775536157988267825578433559044437656935705244373460500358598396450260377616551234505310174605689617135935102917
extra_info: p=29258710744017861149570296304560536145383258074972821895773443051491573019024726303116954752828493568663874444273501, q=22966858911424851865426474280250220359167294262345161553639084310773111097554388329081989268438930936177531707663803, q2=27133319508232939477706927563759694301901665513468452256766586049978096384550459141454206890334407310128601191318347, φ(n)=671980681588048672125738877011616910595171309192390917632486145735608250077671710928467557898579995687263516173582285934997511188260003804859854640204924049613423865709597628379649142197011184648052076329926222187768013722137847000, φ(n2)=793885947016404535029160617097730367600543561934542300852330496973604618480948156173846538257488487134881450821739268304764474908984518286879948075275959075786405732763894225350876688187867384595556260912200185102905003575191631000
subtype: shared_prime
archetype: rsa
